translation.textAbout: Fullstack developer with training in Systems Analysis and Development and specialized in Fullstack software development by Trybe. 3 years of experience in projects using technologies modern technologies, such as JavaScript, TypeScript, React.js, Angular, PHP, C#, .NET, AspNetCore, SQL Server, among others. Focused on good programming practices (SOLID, DRY, Clean Code) and agile methodologies, applying Design Patterns and efficient management with Git Flow. Currently studying an MBA in Cybersecurity and starting a specialization in Systems and Solutions Architecture with applied AI.
